advancements.mekanismtools.alternate_arm: Craft any piece of Armour from Mekanism Tools
advancements.mekanismtools.better_than_n: Protect yourself with a piece of Refined Obsidian Armour
advancements.mekanismtools.loved_by_pigl: Refined Glowstone Armour glows even brighter than gold!
configuration.mekanismtools.server.gear_: The chance that Mekanism Armour can spawn on mobs. This is multiplied modified by the chunk's difficulty modifier. Vanilla uses 0.15 for its armour spawns, we use 0.1 as default to lower chances of mobs getting some vanilla and some mek armour.
